metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4610 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: ** REJECT ** The SRCU code was added in upstream kernel v6.4-rc1 andremoved before v6.4. This bug only existed in development kernels. Pleasesee https://lore.kernel.org/all/ZTKVfoQZplpB8rki@casper.infradead.org andhttps://bugzilla.suse.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1215932 for more information.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
